job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy multimodal generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and deploy multimodal generative AI models' directly refers to the creation and implementation of AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and build scalable, production-ready applications
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and build scalable, production-ready applications' indicates the creation of software systems, aligning with the 'Software Development' task.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate AI models into user-facing products and services
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate AI models into user-facing products and services' describes the process of embedding AI capabilities into functional applications, which is a core part of 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize model performance and deployment pipelines
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Optimize model performance and deployment pipelines' directly relates to the operational aspects of managing AI models in production, fitting the 'Operations Engineering (MLOps)' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune models for specific downstream tasks
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Fine-tune models for specific downstream tasks' is a direct mention of adapting and optimizing AI models for particular purposes, fitting the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop APIs and backend services for AI functionalities
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop APIs and backend services for AI functionalities' clearly points to building the software infrastructure to support AI, which is 'Software Development'.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment with different architectures and training techniques
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Experiment with different architectures and training techniques' describes the process of developing and refining AI models, falling under the 'Modeling' category.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate technical findings and recommendations to stakeholders
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and deployment of 'multimodal generative AI models', fine-tuning them, and integrating them into user-facing applications using frameworks like Hugging Face. This directly aligns with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer.
